title: Help with this font
content:
Seems simple but I can't find an exact match, anyone any ideas ?

Thanks

Paula

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823073936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mosscrop_5886.jpg)
author: Style Embroidery

comments.content:
As usual, very hard to say with such a work. Manually sheared? Originally unicase? Customization of an existing font? Freebie?  
What I could say is it feels "freebie" to me. I can only suggest you to have a look to some sections at DaFont. This would be long but might work: [Techno \> Sci-fi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823073936/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303) and [Techno \> Various](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823073936/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=304)  
Hope this helps...

Thanks for your help, I have found an almost match which will be good enough in your suggestion of Techno \> Sci-fi

Paula
